mapper.select: SELECT SD_OP_CODE "sdOpCode", ASS_NAME "assName",REP_ASS_CODE "repAssCode" , PI_NICKNAME "piNickName", OU_NAME "ouName", SS_NAME "ssName", SS_CODE "ssCode" , REP_TITLE "repTitle", REP_NO "repNo", REP_DATE "repDate", REP_FILE "repFile" , APP_DATE "appDate",WS_NAME "wsName", CHARGER "chaPcCode", REP_NO "repNumber" , REP_START_DATE "repStartDate", REP_END_DATE "repEndDate", REP_CONTENT "repContent" FROM VIEW_REPORT WHERE SD_OP_CODE = #{opCode} AND REP_NO IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT PI_NICKNAME "piNickName", PC_CODE "pcCode", MEM_CODE "memCode" FROM VIEW_PROCEEDING_PROJECT_PEOPLE WHERE OP_CODE = #{opCode}

SELECT DISTINCT OU.OU_NAME "ouName" FROM SCHEDULE_DETAILS SD LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE_STAGE SS ON SS.SS_CODE = SD.SD_SS_CODE LEFT JOIN OUTPUTS OU ON OU.OU_SS_CODE = SS.SS_CODE LEFT JOIN ASSIGNMENT ASS ON ASS.ASS_OU_CODE = OU.OU_CODE LEFT JOIN REPORT R ON R.REP_ASS_CODE = ASS.ASS_CODE WHERE SD_OP_CODE = #{opCode}
SELECT REP_NO FROM ( SELECT REP_NO FROM VIEW_REPORT WHERE SD_OP_CODE = #{opCode} AND REP_NO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY REP_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT(REP_NO, REP_TITLE, REP_CONTENT, REP_START_DATE, REP_END_DATE, REP_DATE, REP_ASS_CODE) VALUES(REPORT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{repTitle}, #{repContent}, TO_DATE(#{repStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{repEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), SYSDATE, #{assCode})
INSERT INTO ACTUAL_TECH(AT_NO, AT_SK_CODE, AT_REP_NO) VALUES(ACTUAL_TECH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{skCode}, #{repNumber})
INSERT INTO APPROVAL(APP_NO, APP_DATE, APP_REP_NO, APP_WS_CODE, APP_PC_CODE) VALUES(APPROVAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{repNumber}, #{wsCode}, #{pcCode})
